participant_1.name: Emily Johnson
participant_1.personality: Ambitious and determined, Emily is passionate about justice and helping others.
participant_1.background: She is a recent college graduate with a degree in Political Science, actively seeking law school opportunities.

participant_2.name: Michael Smith
participant_2.personality: Analytical and supportive, Michael enjoys discussing future aspirations and offers encouragement.
participant_2.background: He is an experienced paralegal who has been working in law for a few years and is considering law school himself.

content.text: i want to be a lawyer
